interactions: m_c is convincing r_c1 that r_c2 isn't so bad once you get to know {PRONOUN/r_c2/object}.
m_c chats with r_c1 about how r_c2 is a nice cat.

r_c1 and r_c2 chatter as they trail behind m_c, meowing softly to avoid {PRONOUN/m_c/object} twitching ears. Why do they often follow behind m_c, like a kit to their mother? As the two express their vexation in silent, m_c twist {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} head at them, enchanting them with a bright, sweet smile. Oh. Now the two cats realized why as they blushed embarrassingly.
